comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (rv:2.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0.1
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0.1

If Hardware acceleration is on and you load some websites, firefox draws failures to the windows task bar.

I think, this will only appear if aero isn't used (not tested).
If Hardware acceleration is off, the problem does not appear.

(All Addons and Themes were still disabled)

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Turn Hardware acceleration in Firefox on
2. Switch your Windows 7 to "classic Design"
3. load some Websites, and see the failures in the task bar

Actual Results:  
firefox draws failures to the windows task bar


OS: Windows 7 64 bit
FF Version: 4.0.1
comments.author: bugzilla@cemx.org

Please post the graphic section from about:support and be sure that you have the latest driver.

This is most likely a driver problem.

Karten-Beschreibung NVIDIA GeForce GT 130
Vendor-ID 10de
Geräte-ID 0626
Karten-Ram 1536

It's almost the latest driver.

comments.raw_text:
The comment #4 is without enabled hwa, yep.

The last lines with enabled hwa are:

Direct2D aktiviert true
DirectWrite aktiviert true (6.1.7601.17514, font cache 12,23 MB)

GPU-beschleunigte Fenster 1/1 Direct3D 10

I have installed the latest driver now, at the problem still exist.
(Treiber-Version 8.17.12.7533
Treiber-Datum 5-20-2011)

@Matthias
For sure, if i close firefox, there wouldn't be any drawing failures on my task bar. Also if i turn hwa off.
